ygData.msgSnippet: welll there about to do some nerfing on monks might want to check on that and see if effects your decision nomad ... From: PsyKo To:
ygData.messageBody:
welll
there about to do some nerfing on monks
might want to check on that and see if effects your decision

nomad
----- Original Message -----
From: PsyKo
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, October 12, 2002 3:26 PM
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] A dilema


Ok, I am trying to decide which character to get
settled into. I have a lvl 8 Monk with 209 NATURAL AC
and a h2h attack of 152. I also have a Mage I am
working on it is also lvl 8. With the mage, I can
help people in the future, by supplying newbies with
phantom plate armor, but with the monk, I have
carefully raised him with very high skill points, and
am able to take on lvl 10-12 equiv mobs. The thought
of taking on dragons is very appealing.
Any help in deciding which one to go further with
would be much appreciated. Catch y'all online,
Marshun AKA Dragonkahn AKA Ustachlak ect... ect... ect..
